subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: What started as a pitchers’ duel between Roger Clemens and John Lackey ended in an Angels win after fill-in-first baseman Miguel Cairo made two errors on one play in the 13th inning.
snippet: What started as a pitchers’ duel between Roger Clemens and John Lackey ended in an Angels win after fill-in-first baseman Miguel Cairo made two errors on one play in the 13th inning.
